content: 2 4 sts back leg round 2 k4 short row 1 rs k2 turn 2 sts round 3 k kfb x 3 7 sts short row 2 ws p2 turn round 4 k to end work short row 1-2 a further 3 times ending with a ws round 5 k2 kfb x 3 k2 10 sts row rounds 6 14 k to end short row 9 rs k2 round 15 k3 k2tog x 2 k3 8 sts round 16 k2tog x 4 4 sts front leg round 17 k2tog x 2 2 sts short row 1 rs k2 turn 2 sts round 18 kfbf x 2 6 sts short row 2 ws p2 turn round 19 kfb x 6 12 sts work short row 1-2 a further 2 times ending with a ws round 20 k1 kf&b x 6 18 sts row round 21 k to end short row 7 rs k2tog turn 1 st round 22 k2 work back leg k10 work back leg k2 18 short row 8 ws p1 turn sts short row 9 rs k1 turn rounds 23 - 24 k to end short row 10 ws p1 turn round 25 k2 k2tog x 4 k2 14 sts short row 11 rs kfb turn 2 sts round 26 k2tog k1 k2tog x 4 9 sts short row 12 ws p2 turn round 27 k4 k2tog k3 8 sts short row 13 rs k2 turn round 28 - 29 k to end short row 14 ws p2 turn round 30 k1 work front leg k2 work front leg k1 short row 15 rs k2 round 31 k to end round 32 k2tog x 4 4 sts round 33 kfbf x 4 12 sts ear round 34 k4 work ear k2 work ear k4 short row 1 rs k1 turn 1 st round 35 k to end short row 2 ws p1 turn round 36 k2 k2tog k4 k2tog k2 10 sts work short row 1-2 a further 2 times ending with a ws round 37 k2 k2tog x 3 k2 7 sts row round 38 k1 k2tog x 3 4 sts short row 7 rs k1 red squirrel brooch pattern version 1 1 november 2025 by woollen wave woollenwave@gmail com / https // www woollenwave co uk / @woollen_wave finishing break yarn leaving a 30cm / 12 in tail and use the yarn tail to sew through the four st on the needle gently pull closed and secure using the same tail sew down through the inside of the squirrel bring the needle out at the base of the upper side of a front leg sew three stitches across the upper edges of the leg and then repeat on the lower leg edge closing the leg loop into a tube repeat for the other three legs secure and lose the yarn end inside the squirrel lose the cast on yarn tail inside the squirrel using the i-cord stitch ladder on the underside of the squirrel and something
